story:
Let me transform this resume into a coherent story:

Meet a dynamic professional whose career journey began behind the drive-thru window at a fast-food restaurant in 2014. There, they mastered the art of quick service, handling hundreds of customers daily while maintaining both speed and accuracy. Their natural talent for customer interaction soon led to a promotion as a hostess, where they learned the intricacies of restaurant operations from a different angle.

By late 2015, they had advanced to become a full-fledged server at an upscale establishment, Kickback Jacks, where they regularly handled up to 100 dinner guests per shift. Their exceptional ability to maintain composure under pressure and create memorable dining experiences didn't go unnoticed. They became known for their encyclopedic knowledge of the menu, skilled handling of the MICROS system, and ability to turn challenging situations into positive outcomes.

In early 2017, they made a strategic career pivot into sales, where their customer service expertise found a new purpose. As a Sales Representative, they've become a master of cold-calling and relationship building, consistently achieving monthly sales profits of at least $5,000. Their technical prowess with tools like Salesforce.com and creative skills with Photoshop and Illustrator have made them a well-rounded sales professional.

This individual's journey from fast food to fine dining to sales demonstrates their adaptability and growing expertise in customer relations. They're bilingual in English, with a strong foundation in both hospitality and sales, backed by various technical skills. Their story is one of consistent growth, always maintaining their core strengths: a positive attitude, strong work ethic, and genuine dedication to customer satisfaction.

Currently, they continue to build their career in sales, bringing their unique blend of hospitality experience and sales acumen to create successful client relationships and drive business growth.
